original_text:
backtester = backtestEngine( ___ ,Name,Value) sets properties on page 15-268 using name-
value pair arguments and any of the arguments in the previous syntax. You can specify multiple
name-value pair arguments. For example, backtester =
backtestEngine(strategies,'RiskFreeRate',0.02,'InitialPortfolioValue',1000,'R
atesConvention',"Annualized",'Basis',2).
